articles.title: Two Dead Stars Found Just 150 Light Years Away Will Explode 10x Brighter Than the Moon - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A nearby cosmic ticking time bomb has been found! Just 150 light years away, a pair of white dwarf stars are on a death spiral, destined to explode in a type 1a supernova. This discovery confirms long-held theories and could help unlock the secrets behind the…
articles.content: In this picture, we capture the binary in the moment where the first white dwarf has just exploded, hurtling material towards its nearby companion which is on the cusp of explosion too. This event wi… [+6004 chars]

articles.author: John Timmer
articles.title: A bonus from the shingles vaccine: Dementia protection? - Ars Technica
articles.description: The study shows a sharp change when the vaccine was introduced in Wales.
